name: Pummel Buddies
description:
Pummel Buddies is a physics based fighting game inspired by Gang Beats. With a cast of wacky characters each with there own special abilities, you try to knockout all other player and be the last one standing. 

There are 4 playable characters so far.

Goobert!

Ability: Slime shot.

fire a projectile that slows your opponents on hit

Guppy!

Ability: Water beam

Fire a beam of water to push opponents back

Howard!

Ability: Triple jump

Using his wings Howard is able to jump three times without touching the ground

T-bone!

Ability: Revive (in development)

Revives with half health upon first death. 

How to install game.

  1. Click the download button to download the game
  2. Right click the downloaded folder and select 'extract all'
  3. Go into the folder and double click on the Application file to run the game

Note: Game currently only works on Windows
